data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Dnet is a complementary library to Pcap, thus I would choose a
    namespace similar to Net::Pcap. Unfortunately, Net::Dnet is already
    taken, and Net::Libdnet seems to me the next best choice.

    See also libdnet's hompage at: http://libdnet.sourceforge.net.
